title: Pork chop “Maman Blanc” with sauté potatoes
description: The best meat in the world, cooked the way my mother would do it. She understood an important basic technique of pan-frying meat in such a way that you can create the most delectable juices.
ingredients: 2 pork chops on the bone, 3cm/1in thick
4 medium potatoes (preferably Maris Piper or King Edward), cut into 1cm/½in and place in a bowl of cold water
8 leaves sage, deep-fried for one minute until crisp
